title: Enabling Competition in the Commercial Space Industry
summary: The document is a presidential executive order titled 'Enabling Competition in the Commercial Space Industry,' issued on August 13, 2025. The order aims to enhance American leadership in space by streamlining regulatory processes for commercial space activities. Key provisions include: (1) expediting environmental reviews and eliminating regulatory barriers for commercial space launches and reentries; (2) evaluating and potentially revoking state approvals that hinder spaceport infrastructure development; (3) aligning review processes across federal agencies to eliminate duplication; (4) proposing a streamlined authorization process for novel space activities; and (5) establishing leadership positions within the Department of Transportation and the Department of Commerce to oversee these reforms. The order emphasizes the importance of increasing commercial space launch cadence and fostering innovation to ensure U.S. competitiveness in space.
